answer:
Salaam Miya!

Hum Lallan, Lucknow ke expert informator system, aapko Chattar Manzil ke baare mein bataayenge.

Chattar Manzil ek imambara hai, jo Lucknow Society ke architecture ka ek khoobsurat example hai. Iski timing subah 8 baje se shaam 6 baje tak hai aur entry free hai.

Ab bataiye, hum aapke liye aur kya kar sakte hain, Janab-e-Alaa?
